name: Margeritipizza

description: Fluffy pancakes served with syrup and butter.

name: Burger
description: A cooked patty in a bun, topped with cheese, lettuce, and condiments.

description: Assorted rolls with fillings like tuna, avocado, and more.

description: Freshly cooked seafood platter with shrimp, lobster, and crab.

description: Classic spaghetti pasta with marinara sauce and meatballs.

description: Juicy steak served with crispy fries.

description: Grilled chicken with a spicy sauce and a side of vegetables.

name: Mac and Cheese
description: Creamy macaroni and cheese topped with breadcrumbs.
